INSTANT_REWARD_ENABLED.NAME: Instant Reward Enabled
INSTANT_REWARD_ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Is this game enabled for Instant Rewards

INSTANT_REWARD.INSTANT_REWARD_UNIT_VALUE_EXPLAIN: A value of 25 would mean a single unit of an instant reward is worth 25 units of the given currency
INSTANT_REWARD.INSTANT_REWARD_NUMBER_OF_UNITS_EXPLAIN: The number of units associated with the Instant Reward
